title: The Fentanyl Crisis Consuming the Country with Sheriff Lamb and Kash Patel
itunes:title: The Fentanyl Crisis Consuming the Country with Sheriff Lamb and Kash Patel
description:
With Turning Point USA’s latest 6-part docuseries, BORDER BATTLE, released on the deadly war taking place at the southern border, Charlie brings on Mark Lamb, Sheriff of Pinal County, Arizona, to dive into the issues he’s seen up close while filming of the documentary as one of the featured experts seen in the series (Available only at SalemNow.com. Use Promocode: KIRK for 20% off) Next, Charlie welcomes friend of show, Kash Patel, to explain the latest in the Igor Danchenko case, as well as a new bombshell report that the FBI offered a $1 million bounty to Christopher Steele if he could prove his dossier was truthful. (Hint: He couldn't)

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
